title: Public-sector IT Leaders Debate Ways to Address “Shadow IT” (GTA - Georgia Technology Authority)
text: ( Source : GTA - Georgia Technology Authority ) The unsanctioned use of cloud services is creating headaches for some public-sector IT and information security leaders. In an article published May 27, 2015 , on Governing.com, Steve Nichols and
